service_figures: INT has over 27 years of experience in delivering cloud, infrastructure, and DevOps services. The company has successfully managed over 11,000 client projects, demonstrating its capability in handling complex IT environments. INT has a proven track record of reducing operational costs by up to 80% and improving system reliability and performance significantly. Their services include comprehensive assessments, intelligent infrastructure management, and seamless migration services, all aimed at optimizing performance and ensuring security.
